short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn about the ethics behind the businesses you use on the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension makes it easy to stay informed about unethical practices done by businesses by adding a business ethics badge next to the business name on Amazon.
